docs.title: LibCustomIcons.GetCurrentFolder
docs.text:
function LibCustomIcons.GetCurrentFolder() -> folderName string

@return folderName - The current folder name where new icons should be put in

Retrieves the current folder where the icons are stored.

docs.title: LibCustomIcons.HasStatic
docs.text:
function LibCustomIcons.HasStatic(username: string) -> hasStatic boolean

@param username - The player's account name (e.g., "@m00nyONE").

@return hasStatic - true if a custom static icons exists, false otherwise.

Checks whether a static icon exists for the given username.

docs.title: LibCustomIcons.HasAnimated
docs.text:
function LibCustomIcons.HasAnimated(username: string) -> hasAnimated boolean

@param username - The player's account name (e.g., "@m00nyONE").

@return hasAnimated - true if a custom animated icons exists, false otherwise.

Checks whether an animated icon exists for the given username.

docs.title: LibCustomIcons.HasIcon
docs.text:
function LibCustomIcons.HasIcon(username: string) -> hasIcon boolean

@param username - The player's account name (e.g., "@m00nyONE").

@return hasIcon - true if a custom static icons exists, false otherwise.

Checks if a custom icon (either static or animated) exists for the given username.

docs.title: LibCustomIcons.GetStatic
docs.text:
function LibCustomIcons.GetStatic(username: string)
 ->  texturePath
 ->  textureCoordsLeft
 ->  textureCoordsRight
 ->  textureCoordsTop
 ->  textureCoordsBottom

@param username - The player's account name (e.g., "@m00nyONE").

Retrieves the texturePath of the static icon for the user or nil if none exists.

docs.title: LibCustomIcons.GetAnimated
docs.text:
function LibCustomIcons.GetAnimated(username: string)
 ->  texturePath
 ->  textureCoordsLeft
 ->  textureCoordsRight
 ->  textureCoordsTop
 ->  textureCoordsBottom
 ->  columns
 ->  rows
 ->  fps

@param username - The player's account name (e.g., "@m00nyONE").

Retrieves the texturePath and animation parameters of the animated icon for the user or nil if none exists.

docs.title: LibCustomIcons.GetAllStatic
docs.text:
function LibCustomIcons.GetAllStatic() -> staticTable table<string,string>

@return staticTable - mapping @accountname to texturePath for all static icons

Retrieves all registered static icons from the internal table as a deep copy. Editing the returning table has no effect to the internal one that is used to retrieve actual icons.

docs.title: LibCustomIcons.GetAllAnimated
docs.text:
function LibCustomIcons.GetAllAnimated() -> animTable table<string,table>

@return animTable - mapping @accountname to {texturePath, width, height, fps} for all animated icons

Retrieves all registered animated icons from the internal table as a deep copy. Editing the returning table has no effect to the internal one that is used to retrieve actual icons.

docs.title: LibCustomIcons.GetStaticCount
docs.text:
function LibCustomIcons.GetStaticCount() -> count number

@return count - The number of static icons

Returns the number of registered static icons. The result is cached after the first computation.

docs.title: LibCustomIcons.GetAnimatedCount
docs.text:
function LibCustomIcons.GetAnimatedCount() -> count number

@return count - The number of animated icons

Returns the number of registered animated icons. The result is cached after the first computation.

docs.title: LibCustomIcons.GetIconCount
docs.text:
function LibCustomIcons.GetIconCount() -> count number

@return count - The total number of icons

Returns the total number of registered icons (static + animated). The result is cached after the first computation.
